Name: NE_SUMO_PLWN_mapping
Description: This conceptual resource provides a mapping between named entities types, SUMO categories and plWordNet synsets. The resource is available for download from the CLARIN-PL repository.

Name: Thesaurus of Modern Slovene 1.0
Description: This is a thesaurus of the modern Slovenian language that is available for download from CLARIN.SI

Name: Cornetto-LMF
Description: This is a resource that combines two resources with different semantic organisations: the Dutch Wordnet with its synset organisation and the Dutch Reference Lexicon which includes definitions, usage constraints, selectional restrictions, syntactic behaviours, illustrative contexts, etc. The resource is available for online browsing through a dedicated webpage.

Name: Hontology
Description: This is an ontology of concepts from the accommodation sector is available for download from CLARIN PORTULAN.
Annotation: terms correlation, rules (lexical patterns) and synonyms

Name: Semantic lexicon of Slovene sloWNet 3.1
Description: This is a wordnet available for download from CLARIN.SI and for online browsing through a dedicated environment.

Name: Estonian Wordnet 2.1
Description: This is a wordnet that is available for download from META-SHARE (CELR distribution).

Name: DanNet, Danish Wordnet (v 2.2)
Description: This wordnet is available for download from the CLARIN-DK repository. The resource is available in the .csv and .owl formats.

Name: WordNet-SALDO (2017-10-16)
Description: This wordnet represents a link between SALDO senses and Core WordNet. The resource can be download from the SWE-CLARIN repository and can be queried online through KARP.

Name: Prolex
Description: This is an ontology of place names available for download from Ortolang.

Name: MWNPT-International WordNet of Portuguese
Description: This is a wordnet that is available if contacting the resource manager.

Name: IWN-LOD
Description: This is an RDF–Linguistic Open Data version of the ItalWordNet v.2. The resource is available for download through ILC4CLARIN.

Name: Open English WordNet
Description:
This is a lexical network of the English language grouping words into synsets and linking them according to relationships such as hypernymy, antonymy and meronymy.
It is intended to be used in natural language processing applications and provides deep lexical information about the English language as a graph.
The resource is available from the Oxford Text Archive.

Name: Saldo
Description: This is an extensive lexicon resource for modern Swedish written language. The resource can be download from the SWE-CLARIN repository and can be queried online through KARP.

Name: Thesaurus for Portuguese – version 2.0
Description:
This is a wordnet-like resource for Brazilian Portuguese focussing on synonyms and antonyms.
The resource is available from PORTULAN.

Name: STO semantics (The Danish SIMPLE Lexicon) - LMF format
Description: This resource presents a unified, ontology-based semantic model – the so-called SIMPLE model – representing an extended Qualia Structure from the Danish SIMPLE Lexicon. The resource is available for download from CLARIN-DK.

Name: ItalWordNet v.2
Description: This is a wordnet available for download from ILC4CLARIN.
Annotation: equivalence relations between Italian synsets and closest concepts in an Inter-Lingual index

Name: Polytropon EL Conceptual Lexicon
Description: This is a lexicon of lexical-semantic relations (e.g. synonymy, antonymy); lexical relations (e.g. word families, allomorphs, syntactic variants); morphosyntactic features (PoS, gender, declension, etc.), which is not yet available for download.

Name: Bring (2015-05-08)
Description: This is a digital version of Bring's thesaurus (1930) that is available for download from the SWE-CLARIN repository.

Name: The Sanat Version of the Finnish TransFrameNet
Description: This is a framenet that is available for online browsing through FIN-CLARIN.

Name: Swesaurus (2017-10-16)
Description: This is a Swedish wordnet that can be downloaded from the SWE-CLARIN repository and can be queried online through KARP.

Name: ItalWordNet Kyoto
Description: This is a wordnet available for download from ILC4CLARIN.

Name: Maltese automatically produced distributional thesaurus
Description: This is a thesaurus that is available for download from CLARIN PORTULAN.

Name: PLWordNet to Sumo mapping
Description: This conceptual resource provides a mapping of plWordNet onto the SUMO ontology. The resource is available for download from the CLARIN-PL repository.

Name: Geo-Net-PT 02
Description: This is an ontology of Portuguese geographic concepts. It is available for download from CLARIN PORTULAN.
Annotation: qualia structure and lexical relations (hyponyms, synonyms)

Name: GermaNet
Description: This wordnet is available for download from a dedicated webpage hosted by Uni Tübingen/CLARIN-D.

Name: plWordNet 4.0
Description: This is a lexico-semantic network which reflects the lexical system of the Polish language with projection to the English language, Słowosieć. The resource is available for download and browsing.

Name: Ontology for the area of Nanoscience and Nanotechnology
Description: This is an ontology of concepts related to nanoscience and nanotechnology available for download from CLARIN PORTULAN.

Name: Swedish FrameNet (2017-10-16)
Description: This is a Swedish conceptual resource that employs the FrameNet++ annotation. The resource can be download from the SWE-CLARIN repository and can be queried online through KARP.

Name: The Icelandic Wordweb
Description:
This is a database of words, categorizations and word relations. The new version consists of a single, large RDF file that houses the Wordweb’s content and is encoded with a standardized vocabulary.
The Wordweb is available for download through the CLARIN.IS repository and is available for online browsing through a dedicated webpage.

Name: Open Ancient Greek WordNet 0.5
Description: This is a wordnet that is available for download through ILC4CLARIN.

Name: Finnish WordNet
Description: This is a wordnet that is available for download from FIN-CLARIN as well as for online browsing.

Name: Finnish FrameNet
Description: This is a wordnet that is available for online browsing through FIN-CLARIN.
